title.narrative: Humanitarian Assistance for those affected by the Syrian Conflict in Syria, Lebanon and Jordan.

description.narrative: With the support of the IRC and its partners, the principal impact of this project is that Syrian and host communities lives are saved, dignities maintained and resilience promoted through health, protection and economic development. As of 1st April 2017 this grant continued for Lebanon only.

participating-org.narrative: Lebanese Association for Development - Al Majmoua

mailing-address.narrative: International Rescue Committee 122 East 42nd Street New York, New York 10168-1289 USA

sector.narrative: IRC TU: Protection, Rule of Law

description.narrative: Disbursement to Lebanese Association for Development - Al Majmoua
